firstNightReminder: Point to a good and a evil Potion. Then ask the Snake Oil Seller to either point to one of the shown Potions or to a Player. Put them to sleep. If they pointed at a Potion, wake any player and tell them they received that Potion. If they pointed at a player, wake that player and tell them that they received 1 of the 2 shown Potions.
otherNightReminder: Point to a good and a evil Potion. Then ask the Snake Oil Seller to either point to one of the shown Potions or to a Player. Put them to sleep. If they pointed at a Potion, wake any player and tell them they received that Potion. If they pointed at a player, wake that player and tell them that they received 1 of the 2 shown Potions.
name: Snake Oil Seller
ability: Each night you learn a good and an evil potion. Choose either 1) which potion for a player to receive, or 2) which player to receive either potion.
flavor: In my scientific opinion, the existence of a Demon would have an impact of gigantic proportions: mythology and legend would become history and science. One could really make a quick buck with it
